    • Method Detail

      • shoot

        public void shoot(Board x,
         Ship[] shipArray)
        Makes the AI shoot a spot on the players field.
        Parameters:
        x - the board where the AI will shoot to.
        shipArray - an array of Ship objects placed on the board.

      • afterHit

        public void afterHit(Board x,
            Ship[] shipArray,
            int posY,
            int posX)
        Chooses how the AI will act after hitting a ship.
        Parameters:
        x - the board where the AI shot.
        shipArray - an array of Ship object placed on the board.
        posY - the Y axis position on the board.
        posX - the X axis position on the board.

      • firstTry

        public void firstTry(Board x,
            Ship[] shipArray,
            int posY,
            int posX)
        Makes the AI try and hit a ship again.

        Chooses from 4 possible directions to where the ship might continue and shoots there if the spot hasn't already been shot.

        Parameters:
        x - the board to where the AI will shoot.
        shipArray - an array of Ship objects located at the board.
        posY - the Y axis position on the board.
        posX - the X axis position on the board.

      • continueTry

        public void continueTry(Board x,
               Ship[] shipArray,
               int posY,
               int posX)
        Chooses how the AI will behave after it has hit a ship twice.

        Makes the AI shoot in the same axis to where two shots hit the same ship twice. If the AI hits an empty shot, it will turn around and start shooting in the opposite direction. The AI will continue to shoot until it has sank the ship.

        Parameters:
        x - the board to where the AI will shoot.
        shipArray - an array of Ship objects located on the board.
        posY - the Y axis position on the board.
        posX - the X axis position on the board.
